subject: Forest and Brush Fires
Olympic Games (2012)
Gymnastics
Fires and Firefighters
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Athletes at the United States Olympic Training Center in Colorado Sprints have had to deal with the threat of wildfires as they prepare for Olympic trial competition.
snippet: Athletes at the United States Olympic Training Center in Colorado Sprints have had to deal with the threat of wildfires as they prepare for Olympic trial competition.
